Translations.Text: Apani ki dekhenani apanara palanakarta hastibahinira sathe kirupa byabahara karechena
tini ki tadera cakranta nasyat kare denani
tini tadera upara prerana karechena jhamke jhamke pakhi
yara tadera upara patharera kankara niksepa karachila.
Atahpara tini taderake bhaksita trnasadrsa kare dena.
